title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Foundations of Statistics and Research Design for Life Science Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can select an appropriate experimental design for a research question and logically explain the rationale.
Learners can apply basic statistical techniques such as T-tests, ANOVA, and regression analysis to actual research data.
Learners can analyze data using statistical software and write a research report incorporating interpretations of the results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
